description.value:
Trigger Your size increases due to a polymorph effect.

You use your body's expansion as leverage to displace a nearby creature. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] an adjacent creature. For the purposes of determining what size creature you can affect, use your final size after the triggering effect.
